text: WATCH Mauricio Pochettino was a happy man after a rare goal from @R9Soldado helped @SpursOfficial see off @Everton: http://t.co/NBmEXKUdHH

GOAL Stoke 3-2 Arsenal (70 mins). @aaronramsey volleys in from @Alexis_Sanchez's corner to make things interesting at the Britannia #STKARS
TEAM NEWS Three changes for @MCFC after the win at Sunderland - Mangala, Fernando and Milner replace Boyata, Fernandinho and Jovetic #MCIEVE
PENALTY to Man City (23 mins) #MCIEVE
SUB Frank Lampard makes his entrance on 78 mins. Jesus Navas makes way. It's Man City 1-0 Everton #MCIEVE

SUB @whufc_official make their second switch as Joey O'Brien replaces Carl Jenkinson. It's West Ham 2-1 Swansea on 80 mins #WHUSWA
GOAL Aston Villa 1-1 Leicester (17 mins). Ciaran Clark heads home Ashley Westwood's free-kick to equalise #AVLLEI
SUB @AVFCOfficial make their final change on 76 mins as Bacuna comes on for N'Zogbia. Villa 2-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
